name: OpenMeter
headline: Usage Metering, AI & API Monetization
description: OpenMeter's mission is to standardize metering with the goal of becoming the data source for AI and API monetization. We've built an open-source platform that processes billions of events into our usage lake in a matter of seconds, which acts as the backbone that serves revenue and efficiency teams.

founders.name: Peter Marton, Founder
founders.description: Hi, I'm Peter. I worked on Stripe's usage and cost platform and built Netflix's serverless infrastructure. Earlier, I co-founded RisingStack, a Node.js performance monitoring company. I recently co-founded OpenMeter.io to help AI & API companies monetize their usage.

founders.name: Andras Toth, Founder
founders.description: Andras is coming from an enterprise cloud and Kubernetes platform company Banzai Cloud (acquired by Cisco) where he mainly worked on the company's service mesh product, Backyards (renamed to Calisti). Previously, he worked at DataCamp and RisingStack & participated in Google Summer of Code two times.

# Fastest Way to Ship Usage-Based Billing
Designed for developers, loved by product teams
[Get started](https://openmeter.io/<https:/openmeter.cloud/sign-up?utm_source=landing&utm_medium=link>)Book a Demo
Trusted By Fast Growing AI and DevOps Companies
![Trigger](https://openmeter.io/_next/static/media/trigger-logo.b36546dc.svg)
![Beam](https://openmeter.io/_next/static/media/beam-logo.bf3ab351.svg)
![Requestly](https://openmeter.io/_next/static/media/requestly-logo.b267c94b.svg)
![Traceloop](https://openmeter.io/_next/static/media/traceloop-logo.f1dfea25.svg)
![Amagi](https://openmeter.io/_next/static/media/amagi-logo.f20c3877.svg)
## The OpenMeter Platform
Real-time metering and billing
![Overview](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Foverview-mobile.01d7edc0.webp&w=3840&q=75)
[Get started](https://openmeter.io/<https:/openmeter.cloud/sign-up>)
### Real-time Metering And Usage Limits
Turn any events, logs, and metrics into revenue. Empower your customers to monitor their usage in real-time and control your costs through usage limits, notifications, and quotas. Our low latency limit enforcement also offers usage gating on the edge.
[Get started](https://openmeter.io/<https:/openmeter.cloud/sign-up?utm_source=landing&utm_medium=link>)
“We use OpenMeter to do per-millisecond compute billing for the Trigger.dev cloud product. It flawlessly handles us sending a massive amount of events and syncing the metering data with Stripe. We use entitlements to restrict our free tier and use the API to power our usage dashboards.”
Matt Aitken, Founder, CEO at Trigger.dev
![Real-time Metering
And Usage Limits](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeature-metering.76fa510e.webp&w=3840&q=75)![Real-time Metering
And Usage Limits](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeature-metering-mobile.8b218133.webp&w=3840&q=75)
### Change Pricing, Break Nothing
OpenMeter is the easiest way to implement self-service usage-based billing and empower sales teams to provision custom deals. It has SDKs for popular programming languages like Node.js, Python, and Go and integrates with CRMs, tax and payment providers.
[Get started](https://openmeter.io/<https:/openmeter.cloud/sign-up?utm_source=landing&utm_medium=link>)
“OpenMeter simplified our entire API billing process at Requestly. It automatically tracks how much each customer uses our API and creates Stripe invoices accordingly. What used to be complex manual work now runs smoothly in the background. It's exactly what we needed for usage-based pricing.”
Sagar Soni, Co-Founder & CTO at Requestly
![Change Pricing, Break Nothing](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeature-changepricing.3dd899f5.webp&w=3840&q=75)![Change Pricing, Break Nothing](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeature-changepricing-mobile.a930845b.webp&w=3840&q=75)
### Launch Products Faster, Enable Deals
Flexible product catalog that supports your pricing and packaging. Makes pricing changes in minutes instead of hardcoding it through weeks of tedious developer work. Whether it’s plans, credits, usage-based pricing, or commitments, OpenMeter does it.
[Get started](https://openmeter.io/<https:/openmeter.cloud/sign-up?utm_source=landing&utm_medium=link>)
“OpenMeter leverages event-streaming techniques from high-scale, battle-tested production systems at the largest companies. As a result you get realtime, reliable, and cost-effective usage-based metering out of the box.”
Nate Smith, Founding CTO at Lever.co
![Launch Products Faster,
Enable Deals](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeature-launchfaster.8525a9dc.webp&w=3840&q=75)![Launch Products Faster,
Enable Deals](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeature-launchfaster-mobile.bcc6b7a8.webp&w=3840&q=75)
### Maximize NRR With Insights
Increase your revenue by acting on usage insights, such as expansion opportunities and identifying fast-growing customers. OpenMeter surfaces revenue opportunities for your sales team in their CRM.
[Get started](https://openmeter.io/<https:/openmeter.cloud/sign-up?utm_source=landing&utm_medium=link>)
“OpenMeter provides a comprehensive view of your customers’ usage and revenue. You can see how much each customer is using your product and how much revenue they are generating. You can also see how much revenue you are losing to churn and how much you are spending on marketing.”
Yunong Xiao, Director of Engineering at Google Cloud
![Maximize NRR With Insights](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeature-nrr.98c6d26d.webp&w=3840&q=75)![Maximize NRR With Insights](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeature-nrr-mobile.95537964.webp&w=3840&q=75)
## Scalable Metering In 5 Minutes
![TypeScript](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flogo_typescript_2x.c700c1be.webp&w=128&q=75)
TypeScript
![Python](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flogo_python_2x.c517d9e2.webp&w=128&q=75)
Python
![Go](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flogo_go_2x.c6450540.webp&w=128&q=75)
Go
![cURL](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flogo_curl_2x.dfd0b456.webp&w=128&q=75)
cURL
1
Meter millions of events per second:
```
import { OpenMeter } from '@openmeter/sdk'
const openmeter = new OpenMeter({ 
 baseUrl: 'https://openmeter.cloud'
})
// Measure OpenAI / ChatGPT token usage
await openmeter.events.ingest({
 id: 'e59cac1f-dd52-43a2-bc4f-36cd3c09a39c',
 type: 'tokens',
 subject: 'user-id',
 data: {
  tokens: 15,
  model: 'gpt-4',
 },
 })
```

2
Get real-time, accurate aggregated usage:
```
// Retreive token usage
const values = await openmeter.meters.query(
 'token-usage',
 {
  subject: ['user-id'],
  from: new Date('2021-01-01'),
  to: new Date('2021-01-02'),
 }
)
```

Billable Prompts:
000,000
Token Usage:
00,000,000
[Checkout our quickstart guide](https://openmeter.io/</docs/getting-started/quickstart/cloud>)
## Collectors For Your Stack
Meter your favorite AI tools, cloud infrastructure, frameworks, and more.
[![Kubernetes](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flogo_kubernetes_2x.56381db2.webp&w=1080&q=75)Read Documentation](https://openmeter.io/</docs/collectors/kubernetes>)[![Amazon S3](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flogo_s3_2x.381aefed.webp&w=1080&q=75)Read Documentation](https://openmeter.io/</docs/collectors/s3>)[![OpenTelemetry](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flogo_opentelemetry_2x.c393ae10.webp&w=1080&q=75)Read Documentation](https://openmeter.io/</docs/collectors/otel>)[![LangChain](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flogo_langchain_2x.d954f629.webp&w=1080&q=75)Read Documentation](https://openmeter.io/</docs/collectors/langchain>)[![Redpanda Connect](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flogo_redpanda_connector_2x.d76885c8.webp&w=1080&q=75)Read Documentation](https://openmeter.io/</docs/collectors/how-it-works>)[![PostgreSQL](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flogo_postgres_2x.a78c20b4.webp&w=1080&q=75)Read Documentation](https://openmeter.io/</docs/collectors/postgres>)
## Build with OpenMeter
OpenMeter is the easiest way to implement self-service usage-based

Documentation
Learn how OpenMeter works, and check out guides, docs, and APIs.
[Read documentation](https://openmeter.io/</docs>)
![Open Source](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fopen-source.97734b25.webp&w=3840&q=75)
Open Source

Secure, out of the box
Highly available SOC2-compliant deployments with RBAC and SSO.
[Read about security](https://openmeter.io/</security>)
## Companies maximizetheir revenue with OpenMeter
Whether you're introducing new pricing, scaling your revenue operations, or consolidating your software stack, OpenMeter works for you.
“AI products need usage metering from the start. Attributing each OpenAI, serverless process, or custom API call ensures that each customer is profitable. As every product adds generative AI capabilities, OpenMeter takes the pain out of scalable billing.”
Show More
Nate Smith, Founding CTO
Lever
![Nate Smith](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fnate-smith.f3a0ea83.webp&w=1920&q=75)
“Consumption based SaaS revenue modeling (usage-based pricing) is a multi-disciplinary problem. It sits at the intersection of tech, process and organizational challenges; from real-time data computation, plug-and-play pricing policies, to orchestrating seamless workflows across multiple functions like Finance, Sales, Revenue Ops, Data & Platform engineering teams. OpenMeter seamlessly solves these needs. It enables Billing platform teams to surface the right strategic trends for the business, feeding into existing Land or Expand motions, highlighting Churn concerns and ultimately empowering an Executive team to adopt a users’ first approach to achieving business goals.”
Show More
Smruti Patel, VP of Engineering
Apollo GraphQL
![Smruti Patel](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fsmruti-patel.d0af5fe1.webp&w=1080&q=75)
“OpenMeter leverages event-streaming techniques from high-scale, battle-tested production systems at the largest companies. As a result you get realtime, reliable, and cost-effective usage-based metering out of the box.”
Show More
Jeff Chao, CTO
Abbey.io (ex-Netflix, ex-Stripe)
![Jeff Chao](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fjeff-chao.88cb26e7.webp&w=1080&q=75)
“With the increasing complexity of technology landscapes, engineering teams often find themselves investing significant time and resources in developing and sustaining real-time usage metering solutions. At this juncture, opting for a sophisticated yet user-friendly product like OpenMeter becomes a strategic move as enables you to unlock productivity by streamlining processes, promoting operational efficiency and allowing your engineering team to focus on core competencies. Make the smart choice, embrace OpenMeter – your key to an effective, robust, and cutting-edge metering solution.”
Show More
Yunong Xiao, Director of Engineering
Google
![Yunong Xiao](https://openmeter.io/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fyunong-xiao.b91f1bde.webp&w=1080&q=75)

generated_description:
### Summary of OpenMeter

**Company Name:** OpenMeter  
**Founded:** 2023  
**Location:** Not specified  
**Team Size:** 7 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W23  

#### Mission
OpenMeter is on a mission to revolutionize usage metering, aiming to standardize how data is collected and monetized in the age of AI and API services. They envision themselves as the primary data source for driving revenue and efficiency for businesses.

#### What They Do
At the core of OpenMeter’s offering is an open-source platform capable of processing billions of events in real time. This platform not only serves as a robust "usage lake" but also integrates seamlessly into existing systems, empowering revenue and efficiency teams to monitor and manage their billing processes effectively.

1. **Real-Time Metering and Billing:** OpenMeter enables companies to monitor their usage in real-time and place controls around costs through usage limits and notifications.  
   
2. **API Integration:** They provide SDKs for popular languages (Node.js, Python, Go) making it easy for developers to implement usage-based billing.

3. **Product Flexibility:** OpenMeter allows teams to update pricing models quickly, enabling sales teams to create custom deals without lengthy developer intervention.

4. **Actionable Insights:** Their platform helps businesses identify new revenue opportunities and track customer usage, helping to maximize net revenue retention (NRR).

5. **Open Source:** OpenMeter values community collaboration and offers their code base under the Apache 2.0 license, encouraging contributions and transparency. 

**Website:** [OpenMeter](https://openmeter.io)

#### Quotes from Users
- Matt Aitken, Founder of Trigger.dev, states: "We use OpenMeter for real-time billing, it flawlessly handles massive event tracking and integrates with Stripe effortlessly."
- Yunong Xiao from Google Cloud shares, "OpenMeter presents a comprehensive view of our customers’ usage, directly correlating activity to revenue—an invaluable tool."

#### Notable Backers
OpenMeter is backed by Y Combinator and has received support from investors like Haystack and Sunflower Capital, which further strengthens its credibility and potential for growth.

#### Why It Matters
In a world where digital services are expanding and consumption patterns are evolving, OpenMeter allows companies to agilely adapt their billing models to reflect real usage, ensuring fairness for consumers and maximizing profits for providers. Its focus on real-time analytics makes it a powerful tool for any company that values transparency and dynamism in billing structures. 

OpenMeter is inviting developers and teams to get started for free, indicating a strong push towards lowering the barrier for entry into efficient billing practices. 

Would you like to dive deeper into a specific aspect of OpenMeter?
